Text: thankyou petafox for the upload. am seeding now. u are awesome petafox.

User Type: Launch mkvmerge and add the cars2 mkv file
Click checkboxes on both video and audio portions
Click on the audio file (mp4a...) to highlight it. Once it is highlighted you can change the options below
Click on the ""Format specific options"" tab
Enter a new Output filename (take care not to overwrite the original)
Use a stretch by ratio of: 63765/63780
Play your new file with perfectly timed audio!"
